Print shipping labels at home with Endicia
Shipping orders can be both costly and time consuming, but Endicia streamlines the process and saves you money — and it’s integrated right into your Bigcommerce control panel.
Our USPS by Endicia shipping option is convenient, efficient and will significantly reduce your shipping costs:
- Save up to 44% over retail postage rates, and never overpay for postage
- Quickly buy and print USPS shipping labels from your Orders screen
- Save time by not having to go to the post office or manually fill out envelopes and labels
